Dayforce, a global leader in Human Capital Management (HCM) with headquarters in Toronto, Ontario, and Minneapolis, Minnesota, operates across North America, EMEA, and APJ regions. Our Cloud HCM platform, recognized for its unified database and continuous calculation engine, enhances efficiency, productivity, and compliance for global workforces. We are committed to "Making Work Life Betterâ„¢" for employees, customers, and partners worldwide.

As an Intern at Dayforce, you'll gain real-world experience with meaningful responsibilities, access to development programs, and the chance to collaborate globally, bringing new ideas and optimizing processes across multiple business units.

Duration: 8 Months (May 2025 - December 2025)

Location: Virtual

Availability: *Full-time availability of 37.5 - 40 hours weekly is required to be eligible for this opportunity.

Benefits for Students:

Experience working for one of the fastest growing Human Capital Management technology companies in the world Access to Dayforce's development programs and resources
Ability to work with as well as create relationships with members across the globe
Autonomy to bring forth new ideas and optimize existing structures within the organization
Meaningful responsibilities, enabling you to obtain 'real-world' experience
Dynamic hands-on exposure to multiple business-units and stakeholders across Dayforce

About the opportunity:

This role involves working cross-functionally to design, implement, and support new and existing features. Primarily focused on software development in testing, the individual will begin with manual QA reporting, and accessibility, before transitioning to automation testing. They will gradually take on development user stories, contributing to both QA and development initiatives.


What you'll get to do:

Actively participate in continuous application improvements by developing and maintaining automated tests.
Coordinate with team members, including developers, QA analysts, and product owners, to produce stable, maintainable, and reliable automated tests.
Ensure automated tests effectively cover new product features and associated requirements.
Analyze test results and improve automated test coverage to maintain and enhance product quality.
Enhance and implement automation framework code to expand automated test coverage.
Adapt to new methodologies and technologies to improve automated testing processes.
Develop expertise in functional and technical aspects of the product across all areas.
Attend team meetings, update timesheets, complete training courses, and maintain the scrum board.
Perform manual QA tasks, including QA reporting, accessibility, and tax forms.
Transition to contributing to automated testing for QA reporting, accessibility, and tax forms.
Gradually take on development user stories and expand responsibilities.
Gain exposure to the release process by taking on the scrum master role, if time allows.

Skills and Experience we value:

University degree in Computer Science or a related field.
Experience in enterprise software development.
Proficiency in Object-Oriented Programming using C# and/or Java.
Strong experience in writing maintainable code and creating automated test scripts with tools like Selenium, Cucumber, and JMeter.
Knowledge of SQL and a solid understanding of relational database systems.
Strong communication skills, both verbal and written.
Ability to work effectively in a team environment.
Experience working in an Agile development environment with a solid understanding of the development process.
Experience with API testing.

What would make you really stand out:

Selenium and Specflow
Agile
Experience working in HCM
Experience with performance testing tools and processes

What's in it for you

Dayforce is fueled by the diversity of our talented employees. We are an equal opportunity employer and consider and embrace ALL individuals and what makes them unique. We believe our employees should be happy and healthy, with peace of mind and a sense of fulfillment.

We encourage individuals to apply based on their passions.

Dayforce encourages personal and professional growth. We offer excellent time away from work programs, comprehensive wellness initiatives and recognition through competitive pay and benefits.

With a commitment to community impact, including volunteer days and our charity, Dayforce Cares we provide opportunities for you to thrive both in your career and personal life. Our focus is not just on your job but on supporting you to be the best version of yourself.

Fraudulent Recruiting

Beware of fraudulent recruiting. Legitimate Dayforce contacts will use an @dayforce.com or @Ceridian.com email address. We do not request money, checks, equipment orders, or sensitive personal data during the recruitment process. If you have been asked for any of the above, or believe you have been contacted by someone posing as a Dayforce employee, please refer to our fraudulent recruiting statement found here: https://www.dayforce.com/be-aware-of-recruiting-fraud
